question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. yellow bus on the left
B. sign with a person on it
C. None
D. None

options.B: sign with a person on it

triage_reason: The yellow bus on the left is clearly positioned further down the road and behind the foreground bus, while the sign with a person on it is on a building to the right, closer to the camera's perspective.
